heading: About Me
summary: I am a B.Tech Computer Science Engineering (AI & ML) undergraduate admitted in 2023, with a strong focus on Deep Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs), Generative AI, and scalable full-stack systems. I specialize in architecting intelligent, high-performance applications by integrating state-of-the-art machine learning models with modern cloud-native web technologies. My goal is to build real-world AI solutions that are robust, efficient, and impactful.

timeline.title: B.Tech CSE (AI & ML) — Undergraduate
timeline.description: Pursuing undergraduate studies with specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, focusing on deep learning, neural networks, computer vision, NLP, generative AI, and advanced software engineering practices.

timeline.title: AI Research & Advanced Project Development
timeline.description: Actively working on research-driven projects in ECG signal processing, respiratory sound analysis, computer vision, generative AI pipelines, and large-scale deep learning systems.

timeline.title: Production-Grade AI Systems & Full-Stack Development
timeline.description: Designing and building scalable AI-powered web platforms using React, FastAPI, cloud services, and optimized deployment pipelines, emphasizing performance, reliability, and real-world impact.

mission: To engineer intelligent systems that bridge academic research and real-world deployment, delivering scalable, efficient, and impactful AI-driven solutions.
